creator: jeremy_a@bigfoot.com
text:
Create a new test plan.  Make some modification to it, and then choose to Exit
JMeter.  It will ask if you want to save the Test Plan.  Answer Yes, and it will
pop up a File dialog (since this Test Plan has not been saved before).  Press
Cancel in the File dialog.

I would expect this to return to JMeter without exiting -- just as if you
pressed Cancel when JMeter asked if you want to save before exiting.  Instead,
JMeter will exit without saving.
